body:
Hi, I am Midnight/Ender. I have recently just finished my black and white pvp texture pack. I want to advertise it to different people to see the feedback I get. I have a texture pack showcase vid: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=26HO1F1_psA
And hopefully you will love it. 
People I have to give credit for:
Custom Sky is from Solrflares Pack: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f8WEZKZGAmk

Normal apple and golden apple are from Syko's Pack: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BXgEfQZa7Pc

Rest of the food is from JustAGoldenCarrot's Pack: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vnI4p1IadeM

Download is: http://www.mediafire.com/download/rez21k5vt8tgzko/Midnight+Snow+Pack+Black+and+White+Boss.rar

Rules: Give credit whenever you are using it in your videos, otherwise I will find you, and I will kill you... in Minecraft.

Kindness: It would be great if you could subscribe ;)
